attributes.action: Reconsider the removal of the 10% tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is due to come into force this April and will affect those on some of the lowest incomes in the country and perhaps with the smallest voices. This was announced in last year's budget and has probably been forgotten by many people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
